overview: City views of Perm. The movement of ships on the river. Visitors in the art gallery. Production processes at the Perm cable plant. Construction of a chemical plant. Performance at the Perm Circus. Students of Perm Ballet School in the dressing room before the performance, among the speakers are ballerinas O. Chenchikova and N. Pavlova.
title: Newsreel "Soviet Ural" № 44
